creator: EduGorilla TestSeries3
descriptionHtml:
Preparing for IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam? Download the No. 1 Vernacular Test Series app #EduGorilla and get:
- 17,201+ mocks for 550+ competitive exams
- Questions that you would probably get in IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam
- A multitude of IIT JAM (Mathematics) mocks, sectional tests, and previous year papers
- Tests in both English and Hindi

About IIT JAM (Mathematics):

IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam is conducted online by the IITs on behalf of the Ministry of Human Resources Development (MHRD), to select eligible candidates for their Master’s Program (M.Sc., M.Sc. Ph.D. and M.Sc. Ph.D. dual degree, etc.). IIT JAM (Mathematics) is one of the most renowned exams among those candidates who wish to pursue Post Graduate Doctorate Studies in Science. This app helps you to prepare for the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam by providing the best online test series. You can practice mock tests of the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam online and achieve success.

IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam App Details:

• IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam test series provides syllabus-wise unique Calculus and Algebra questions based on the latest exam pattern
• IIT JAM (Mathematics) series by EduGorilla also helps to prepare for the exam and offer questions based on the latest pattern
• Previous year papers and mock tests are also provided for better practice of IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam

IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam Online Test Series:

Practice IIT JAM (Mathematics) online test series only on EduGorilla. The test series is specially designed keeping in mind the level of IIT JAM (Mathematics) exams. All the mock tests are based on the updated exam pattern and can be accessed 24x7 online.

In IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam Mock Test:

Get more than 20 Mock Tests for the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam. The test series gets updated on a regular basis. You will get new mock tests for IIT JAM (Mathematics) exams that can be accessed online anywhere anytime. Sectional tests and topic wise mock tests are also given to help you practice more.

Key Features of EduGorilla’s IIT JAM (Mathematics) Test Series:

EduGorilla offers a lot of features in its IIT JAM (Mathematics) test series –
• Exams covered: IIT JAM (Mathematics), Sectional Tests, and Previous year papers
• More than 20 mock tests and sectional tests mock tests available
• 24×7 Online Access
• Personalized Performance Analysis of your mock test with All India & State Ranks
• Online Mock Tests as per the latest pattern; section-wise test papers

Subjects Covered:

Mathematics Syllabus-

Sequences And Series of Real Numbers- Bolzano-Weierstrass Theorem, Absolute Convergence, Ratio Test, Root Test, Leibniz Test
Functions of One Real Variable- Limit, Continuity, Intermediate Value Property, Theorem, Mean Value Theorem, L'Hospital Rule, Taylor's Theorem, Maxima & Minima
Functions of Two Or Three Real Variables- Limit, Continuity, Partial Derivatives, Differentiability
Integral Calculus- Integration as the Inverse Process of Differentiation, Definite Integrals & their Properties
Differential Equations- Ordinary Differential Equations of the First Order of the Form Y'=F(X,Y), Bernoulli’s Equation
Vector Calculus- Scalar & Vector Fields, Surface Integrals, Stokes & Gauss Theorems
Group Theory- Groups, Subgroups, Abelian & Non-Abelian Groups, Cyclic Groups, Permutation Groups, Normal Subgroups, Lagrange's Theorem
Linear Algebra- Finite-Dimensional Vectors, Linear Independence, Matrix Representation, Rank-Nullity, Cayley-Hamilton Theorem
Real Analysis- Interior Points, Limit Points, Sets, Completeness of R. Power Series, Taylor’s Series, Term-Wise Differentiation & Integration of Power Series

Alerts & Updates:

Get regular alerts & latest updates of the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam in EduGorilla’s app, like exam notifications, important dates, syllabus, etc.
descriptionShort: Practice best online test series only on EduGorilla IIT JAM (Mathematics) App.

This app helps you to prepare for the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam by providing the best online test series. You can practice mock tests of the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam online and achieve success.

IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam App Details:

• IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam test series provides syllabus-wise unique Calculus and Algebra questions based on the latest exam pattern
• IIT JAM (Mathematics) series by EduGorilla also helps to prepare for the exam and offer questions based on the latest pattern
• Previous year papers and mock tests are also provided for better practice of IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam

IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam Online Test Series:

Practice IIT JAM (Mathematics) online test series only on EduGorilla. The test series is specially designed keeping in mind the level of IIT JAM (Mathematics) exams. All the mock tests are based on the updated exam pattern and can be accessed 24x7 online.

In IIT JAM (Mathematics) Exam Mock Test:

Get more than 20 Mock Tests for the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam. The test series gets updated on a regular basis. You will get new mock tests for IIT JAM (Mathematics) exams that can be accessed online anywhere anytime. Sectional tests and topic wise mock tests are also given to help you practice more.

Key Features of EduGorilla’s IIT JAM (Mathematics) Test Series:

EduGorilla offers a lot of features in its IIT JAM (Mathematics) test series –
• Exams covered: IIT JAM (Mathematics), Sectional Tests, and Previous year papers
• More than 20 mock tests and sectional tests mock tests available
• 24×7 Online Access
• Personalized Performance Analysis of your mock test with All India & State Ranks
• Online Mock Tests as per the latest pattern; section-wise test papers

Subjects Covered:

Mathematics Syllabus-

Sequences And Series of Real Numbers- Bolzano-Weierstrass Theorem, Absolute Convergence, Ratio Test, Root Test, Leibniz Test
Functions of One Real Variable- Limit, Continuity, Intermediate Value Property, Theorem, Mean Value Theorem, L'Hospital Rule, Taylor's Theorem, Maxima & Minima
Functions of Two Or Three Real Variables- Limit, Continuity, Partial Derivatives, Differentiability
Integral Calculus- Integration as the Inverse Process of Differentiation, Definite Integrals & their Properties
Differential Equations- Ordinary Differential Equations of the First Order of the Form Y'=F(X,Y), Bernoulli’s Equation
Vector Calculus- Scalar & Vector Fields, Surface Integrals, Stokes & Gauss Theorems
Group Theory- Groups, Subgroups, Abelian & Non-Abelian Groups, Cyclic Groups, Permutation Groups, Normal Subgroups, Lagrange's Theorem
Linear Algebra- Finite-Dimensional Vectors, Linear Independence, Matrix Representation, Rank-Nullity, Cayley-Hamilton Theorem
Real Analysis- Interior Points, Limit Points, Sets, Completeness of R. Power Series, Taylor’s Series, Term-Wise Differentiation & Integration of Power Series

Alerts & Updates:

Get regular alerts & latest updates of the IIT JAM (Mathematics) exam in EduGorilla’s app, like exam notifications, important dates, syllabus, etc.
descriptionShort: Practice best online test series only on EduGorilla IIT JAM (Mathematics) App.

Subjects Covered in IIT JAM Mathematics Exam
👉 Sequences and Series of Real Numbers: convergence of sequences, Sequence of real numbers
👉 Functions of One Real Variable: Limit, continuity, differentiation, Taylor's theorem, maxima and minima
👉 Functions of Two or Three Real Variable: Limit, partial derivatives, differentiability, maxima and minima, continuity

👉 Differential Equations: integrating factor, orthogonal trajectories, Cauchy-Euler equation,

👉 Linear Algebra: Finite dimensional vector spaces, basis, dimension, linear transformations, matrix representation

descriptionHtml:
The Joint Admission Test for M.Sc. is an admission test conducted every year for admission into Master of Science and other post-graduate science programs at the Indian Institutes of Technology. It is one of the toughest exams in India. Lakhs of students appear for the IIT JAM examination to get selected for their higher studies. Therefore to assist the students with exam preparation, we have introduced our IIT JAM Mathematics Exam Preparation App. Our online learning app covers all the essential topics that are very much essential to crack the examination.

Special Features 🤩 of EduGorilla's IIT JAM Mathematics Exam Preparation App
👉 Accessible 💻 24*7 from any & all devices
👉 Latest pattern Mock Tests 📖 & Current Affairs 📖 present in IIT JAM Mathematics Practice Exam App
👉 30+ Mocks and Sectional Tests ⏳ with questions as per the latest exam pattern
👉 Smart user-interface that saves 40% of study time ⏱️
👉 Daily News 📖 provided for the latest issues
👉 Relevant Current Affairs 📖 for the exams
👉 Reminders for Regular Exam Updates 📖
👉 Daily Quiz ⏳ to test your preparation
👉 Detailed analysis 💡 and performance comparison 🤟 on All-India & State-Level basis
👉 Accessible in English Language ✍️
👉 The best online exam preparation app available at modest price 🤩

IIT JAM Mathematics App Details
The online learning app for IIT JAM Mathematics consists of all the essential exam details which include our online test series and study materials. All the required materials and online test series have been crafted by our proficient faculties based on the revised exam pattern and syllabus. We also extend a smart user-friendly interface that helps the students to learn the concepts with utmost easiness.
We also have topic-based and sectional test series which make the preparation much easier. We aim to promote efficient learning with our IIT JAM Mathematics mock test app. Our online learning app helps to maximize the level of preparation. Therefore, with all the specifications our IIT JAM Mathematics practice exam app is one of the best online learning app available in the market to crack the exam.

Subjects Covered in IIT JAM Mathematics Exam
👉 Sequences and Series of Real Numbers: convergence of sequences, Sequence of real numbers
👉 Functions of One Real Variable: Limit, continuity, differentiation, Taylor's theorem, maxima and minima
👉 Functions of Two or Three Real Variable: Limit, partial derivatives, differentiability, maxima and minima, continuity
👉 Integral Calculus: Integration as the inverse process of differentiation, fundamental theorem of calculus
👉 Differential Equations: integrating factor, orthogonal trajectories, Cauchy-Euler equation,
👉 Vector Calculus: Scalar and vector fields, curl, line integrals, surface integrals, Green, gradient
👉 Linear Algebra: Finite dimensional vector spaces, basis, dimension, linear transformations, matrix representation

IIT JAM Mathematics Exam Pattern
👉 Mode of Exam: Online
👉 Duration: 60 Minutes
👉 No. of Questions: 60
👉 Total Marks: 100
